ygData.subject: Re: Demon Claw
ygData.messageBody:
What does it look like??

> ----------
> From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 12:08 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Demon Claw
>
> From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
> Damn I feel cool now, scored me a Demon Claw this weekend. What is a
> Demon Claw, well its a really nice, really cool looking, magic 1h slashing
> weapon that the Avitar of Fear carries. The AoF is high, real high, 30s,
> 38 or so, but his claw kicks butt. Damage is only 5, but speed is 19, yes
> 19, I swing it about 6 or 8 times in the time it takes me to swing my BBC
> just twice. In some fights I swear the thing swings almost continusouly.
> Needless to say, this weapon has restored my faith in dual wielding.
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Looking for a new hobby? Want to make a new friend?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Come join one of the 145,000 email communities at ONElist!
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!
>
